description.translate: Some say that a king does not walk, he moves, carried by his majesty.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6Mustésèv gal azazel\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7D'aucuns disent qu'un roi ne marche pas,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7il se meut, porté par sa Majesté.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Some say that a king does not walk,\"}","{\"text\":\"§7he moves, carried by his majesty.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7SPD§a3 §7DAR§a1\"}"]}}
